full_summary:
### Tender Alert: Request for Proposal - Electrical Distribution Systems

#### Solicitation Details

 * **Solicitation Number**: WS4605866833
* **Publication Date**: 2024-06-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-24T14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-07-18

#### Tender Status

* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
* **Selection Criteria**: Prix le plus bas (Lowest Price)

#### Procurement Details

 * **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open Bidding)
* **Procurement Category**: *GD (Goods and Services)
* **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Requirement Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of electrical distribution systems including the delivery.

#### Contracting Entity and End User

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5 Canada
* **End User**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2 Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Corine Lavoie
* **Contact Email**: corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Additional Details

* **Tender Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20090175?extsite=MjAwOTAxNzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Solicitation Documents**: [TBD] [Please refer to the solicitation documents for additional details] 
* **Tender Description**: Please refer to the solicitation documents for additional information on the requirement.)
